name: mohan
subject: Application for Senior DevOps Engineer - {company_name}
summary: I’m writing to express my interest in the DevOps Engineer position at {company_name}. With 4.8 years of experience in AWS, Terraform, Kubernetes, Ansible, Jenkins, Docker, and CI/CD automation, I specialize in building scalable cloud infrastructures and implementing DevSecOps and AI-based monitoring solutions. I’m skilled in monitoring and logging tools like Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK Stack, with a strong focus on security integration using SonarQube, Trivy, and Snyk. Additionally, I bring proficiency in Python and Shell scripting.
